home.headline: Software engineer and builder
home.subline: I'm Zaid, a software engineer at Erebus, where I craft innovative solutions. After hours, I build my own projects.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Zaid is a Pakistan-based design engineer with a passion for transforming complex challenges into simple, elegant software solutions. His work spans cross-platform digital interfaces, interactive experiences, and the convergence of design, technology and automations.

ARC.achievements: Created chatbots for ARC, resulting in an increased user engagement and immediate response times ;Spearheaded the integration of AI tools into design workflows, enabling developers to iterate over solutions faster.

Freelancer.achievements: Developed multiple cross-platform applications for numerous clients, Projects included simple apps for Schools / POS solutions for restaurants. Complex solutions included developing VPN software with end to end encryption as well as VPS management softwares.

App-Development.description: Able to create cross platform apps (Android / iOS / MacOS / Windows / Linux.

AI.description: Building next gen apps with AI. Using APIs for simpler workloads and custom solutions for complex workloads

Automation.description: If anything can be done via code once ; It can be automated to make life simpler!
